title: (SOLD) Asus GeForce GTX 970 Turbo OC HDMI DP 2xDVI 4GB

posts.text:
Asus GeForce GTX 970 Turbo OC HDMI DP 2xDVI 4GB for sale for 35000isk.
Bought in November 2015. Works like a charm. I have not overclocked it at all since it already has a pretty high clock from store. 
The reason for selling is that I am upgrading for a better one. 
If you have any questions feel free to send me a message in English, Icelandic or Swedish. 
Oh and the box that it comes with is still in Sweden but I can have it sent here in a month or so if you would want it. The receipt and the guarantee is still in the box. 
I live in Seltjarnarnes but could met up somewhere if you want.
Have a great day.
Price: 35000isk
was the card bought in Sweden?
Have you sold it yet ? if not I was wondering if I can buy it for 30.000isk
Sorry Rikki. I decided on selling my whole computer instead. Thank you for the offer!
